body:
After digging into not only the various error response codes, but the actual _display_ of the error messages, I've found some inconsistencies in our forms' validation/error handling.

For instance, we've been skipping front-end validation entirely, since all fields are marked as optional. This has worked fine since the back end validates on its own, which is why we haven't really noticed. There were also a handful of spots (around approval requests) where we didn't do any sort of validation/error handling. The more I dig into our forms, the more I'd like to refactor them. To prevent blowing up this PR, I will open another with those changes.

This is ready for another pass!
